languages.text: "Воистину, Ваша Светлость! Однако большая часть забот теперь ляжет на плечи ваших подданных".
"Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."
languages.original_text: "Воистину, Ваша Светлость! Однако большая часть забот теперь ляжет на плечи ваших подданных".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."
"Indeed, {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."
"Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."
"Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."
"Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."

languages.text: 「もちろんです、陛下！しかし、その仕事の大半はあなたの部下が担うことになります」
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです、陛下！しかし、その仕事の大半はあなたの部下が担うことになります」

languages.text: “遵命，大人！从现在起，请让您的臣民为您分忧。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人！从现在起，请让您的臣民为您分忧。”

languages.text: «¡Así es, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Pero por ahora la mayor parte de las preocupaciones recaerá sobre sus súbditos».
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."

traits.locale_text: «¡Así es, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Pero por ahora la mayor parte de las preocupaciones recaerá sobre sus súbditos».

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, Votre Seigneurie ! Mais à partir de maintenant, le plus gros du travail est de la responsabilité de vos sujets. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, Votre Seigneurie ! Mais à partir de maintenant, le plus gros du travail est de la responsabilité de vos sujets. »

languages.text: "In der Tat, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Doch von nun an wird die Hauptlast der Sorge von Euren Untertanen geschultert."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Doch von nun an wird die Hauptlast der Sorge von Euren Untertanen geschultert."

languages.text: "Emredersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Ancak meselelerin büyük çoğunluğunu tebaanız omuzlayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But from now on, the bulk of the worries will be shouldered by your subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Emredersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Ancak meselelerin büyük çoğunluğunu tebaalarınız omuzlayacaktır."
